text: I am planning to do a small web application that will be distributed as a single installable.
I have plans to develop this application in either Python/Django or RoR.
(I am a Java/C++ programmer, hence both these languages are new to me).
My main concern is about the size and simplicity of final installable (say setup.exe).
I want it to be small in size and also should be able to pack all required components in it.
Which one among Python/Django and RoR is suitable for me?
